acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.desc: By accessing and using wkeel.ai ('the Website'), you agree to follow these Terms and Conditions. If you do not accept any part of these terms, please do not use the Website.

changes.title: Amendments to Terms
changes.desc: wkeel.ai reserves the right to update these Terms and Conditions at any time. It is the user's duty to regularly review these terms. Continued use of the Website signifies acceptance of the revised terms.

useOfTheWebsite.title: Usage of the Website
useOfTheWebsite.desc: The Website is provided 'as is'. Users are allowed to use it for lawful purposes only. Unauthorized use may result in legal consequences.

subscriptionFees.title: Subscription Fees
subscriptionFees.desc: Currently, the Website offers its features at no cost. However, wkeel.ai reserves the right to implement subscription fees or other charges for any feature at any time. Users will be notified of such changes and will have the option to continue using the service under the new fee structure.

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.desc: wkeel.ai is dedicated to protecting user privacy. We do not sell, trade, or rent user data. We comply with data protection regulations in the MENA region and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.desc: wkeel.ai will not be liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the Website.

intellectualPropertyRights.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualPropertyRights.desc: All content, trademarks, and data on the Website, including but not limited to software, databases, text, graphics, icons, and hyperlinks, are the property of or licensed to wkeel.ai and are protected by law. Unauthorized use of this content is prohibited.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.desc: The Website may contain links to third-party websites. wkeel.ai is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites. Accessing these links is at the user's own risk.

termination.title: Termination
termination.desc: wkeel.ai reserves the right to terminate or suspend access to the Website, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms and Conditions.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.desc: Users agree to indemnify and hold wkeel.ai harmless from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorney's fees) arising from their use of the Website or violation of these Terms and Conditions.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.desc: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Kuwait. Any disputes arising under these Terms and Conditions will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the State of Kuwait.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.desc: For any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please reach out to us at support@wkeel.ai.
